subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After announcing that Amar’e Stoudemire would be out indefinitely with a bulging disk in his lower back, the Knicks gave Coach Mike Woodson his seventh victory in eight games.
snippet: After announcing that Amar’e Stoudemire would be out indefinitely with a bulging disk in his lower back, the Knicks gave Coach Mike Woodson his seventh victory in eight games.
